title: Wonderful models; the romance of the world in miniature and a complete encyclopædia of modelcraft, comprising the construction and use of representative and working models in advertising, architecture and building, civil and mechanical engineering, naval architecture, and railway engineering, and the application of electricity to their operation; also the romance of historic models and the modern development of model engineering as an aid to invention, as a recreation, and as an essential element in education.
author: Marshall, Percival, 1870-1948
